scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.build:server: if not exist dist mkdir dist && xcopy /E /I routes dist\routes && xcopy /E /I controllers dist\controllers && xcopy /E /I config dist\config && xcopy /E /I middleware dist\middleware && xcopy /E /I models dist\models && copy server.mjs dist\ && copy package.json dist\ && copy .env.production dist\.env
scripts.build:client: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
